footer_disclaimer: Wszelkie prawa zastrzeżone, nie udzielamy gwarancji. Narzędzia DeFi nie są zabawkami. Korzystaj z nich na własne ryzyko.
using_contract: Portfele kontraktowe nie są obecnie obsługiwane

landing.intro_title: Lux Self-Repaying Loans allow you to leverage a range of tokens without risk of liquidation.
landing.intro_subtitle_0: Borrow up to 50% of your deposited collateral
landing.short_explainer: By borrowing a synthetic version of the asset you deposit you'll avoid the risk of liquidation. Defi innovation on a whole new level, Lux is the first same-asset loan product in DeFi.
landing.short_explainer_end: Using your collateral we earn yield on your behalf to pay off your loan automagically!
landing.path_subtitle: A multi-functional account for all your financial needs
landing.benefit_leverage_blurb: Keep exposure to important assets while making them work for you. Leverage more of your wealth (without risk of liquidation!) by borrowing a synthetic version of your collateral.
landing.benefit_range_blurb: Lux is opening doors to new collateral types. Leverage more of your wealth than ever before.
landing.benefit_liquidations_blurb: No matter what happens we'll never liquidate your deposit. You can choose to self-liquidate your own loan at your own discretion.
landing.benefit_flexible_blurb: Lux doesn't lock your deposit or charge you fees. Your funds are accessible 100% of the time. You can also repay your debt whenever you like.

governance_page.title: Zarządzanie
governance_page.subtitle: Propozycje ulepszeń w Lux
governance_page.noOpenVotes: Nie ma żadnych otwartych propozycji obecnie.
governance_page.noTranslation: The results are fetched through external APIs and are not translated from their original language.

farm_page.saddle_text: Wpłać alUSD, FEI, FRAX i/lub LUSD, aby zarobić ALCX, TRIBE, FXS i LQTY
farm_page.sushi_text: Wpłać alUSD i ETH na Sushiswap, aby zarobić SUSHI

transmuter_page.disclaimer: Transmuter operations are paused for the benefit of the AMO, in accordance with AIP-39.

vaults_page.title: Skarbce
vaults_page.subtitle: Deposit collateral and borrow your future yield right away

small_screen.title: Co to jest? DeFi 2.0 dla mrówek?
small_screen.message: Lux v2 nie obsługuje jeszcze małych ekranów. Proszę skorzystać z większego ekranu lub zmienić rozmiar okna przeglądarki.

modals.liq_disclaimer: I understand that liquidating will use my deposited collateral to repay the outstanding debt
modals.transfer_loan: Transfer loan to a different wallet
modals.transfer_error: The provided address is not valid. Please check the input.
modals.transfer_disclaimer: I have verified the above address to be the correct recipient of my new loan
modals.slippage_below_safe: Slippage tolerance very low, transaction might revert.
modals.slippage_above_max: Slippage higher than maximum possible amount.
modals.slippage_above_safe: Slippage tolerance very high, loss of funds might occur.

galcx.title: gALCX Wrapper
galcx.leading: A liquid ALCX wrapper for single-sided staking.
galcx.p_1: Wrap your ALCX into gALCX and have your ALCX work for you in the single sided staking pool while staying in control of your gALCX.
galcx.p_2: Autocompounding increases the amount of ALCX you can unwrap per gALCX.

migration.title: Legacy Migration
migration.liq_explain: First step is to liquidate your outstanding debt, if applicable.
migration.wit_explain: Second step withdraws your entire balance from V1.
migration.mig_explain: Third step flashloans your new balance into a deposit with 50% LTV ratio and 1.95× leverage.
migration.paragraph_1: To make it as simple as possible to migrate your Legacy vault deposits into V2, Lux is providing a migration tool which enables you to transfer your position into V2 while staying as gas-cost efficient as possible.
migration.paragraph_2: Your wallet will prompt you a few times to sign transactions that take care of the following steps:
migration.no_position: No legacy positions detected, you're all good!
migration.cus_explain: Choose an amount that you want to flashloan into a new v2 position, as well as the desired leverage for your new deposit.
